title: Netflix Data
text:
Sources:
 TidyTuesday Data 
 Netflix Engagement Report 



show code
library(tidyverse)




show code
movies <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2025/2025-07-29/movies.csv')
shows <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2025/2025-07-29/shows.csv')




show code
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)




show code
shows |> 
  filter(release_date >= as.Date("2024-01-01") & release_date <= as.Date("2024-12-31")) |> 
  arrange(desc(hours_viewed)) |> 
  slice(1:10) |> 
  
  ggplot(aes(x = release_date, y = hours_viewed)) + 
    geom_point(size = 2) + 
    labs(
      title = "Top 10 Netflix Shows Released in 2024: Hours Viewed vs Release Date",
      x = "Release Date",
      y = "Hours Viewed"
    )

title: About Me
text: Hi, there! Iâ€™m Evelyn, a current junior at Pomona College studying Economics with minors in Data Science and French. Outside of academics, I enjoy playing volleyball and going on runs!

title: Income Inequality
text:
Sources:
 TidyTuesday Data 
 Ourworld Data 



show code
library(tidyverse)




show code
income_inequality_processed <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2025/2025-08-05/income_inequality_processed.csv')
income_inequality_raw <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2025/2025-08-05/income_inequality_raw.csv')




show code
ggplot(income_inequality_processed, aes(x = gini_mi_eq)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.05, fill = "blue", color = "white", na.rm = TRUE) +
  labs(
    title = "Distribution of Pre-Tax Income Inequality Across Countries",
    x = "Gini Coefficient (Pre-Tax, Equivalized Income)",
    y = "Number of Countries"
  )
